thread.title: Apples iOS Update Includes Taco Champagne Bottle Emoji
thread.title_full: Apples iOS Update Includes Taco Champagne Bottle Emoji

title: Apples iOS Update Includes Taco Champagne Bottle Emoji
text:
Apple's iOS Update Includes Taco, Champagne Bottle Emoji 
ABC News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
.1 update released this week includes more than 150 new emoji characters, including the oft-requested taco, a champagne bottle with a popping cork, a unicorn and even a middle finger. 
While the Unicode Consortium, the group overseeing emoji standards across platforms, first showed off its latest line-up of new emoji earlier this year, it's up to each company to then include the new characters in future operating system updates. 
...
